Categories.Name: Gears
Categories.Description: A gear or cogwheel is a rotating machine part having cut teeth, or cogs, which mesh with another toothed part to transmit torque.

Categories.Name: Suspensions
Categories.Description: Suspension is the system of tires, tire air, springs, shock absorbers.

Categories.Name: Valves
Categories.Description: A valve is a device that regulates, directs or controls the flow of a fluid.
